---
id: modify-group-attributes
title: "Modify group attributes"
description: "By calling this API, you can set the group attributes of a group."
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/en/docs_zim_server/Group/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Modify group attributes</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


By calling this API, you can set the group attributes of a group.

<Note title="QPS Limit"> 20 times/s</Note>

## Request

Application ID, assigned by ZEGOCLOUD. schema={{"type":"string","description":"Group attribute key. When modifying group attributes, if the group attribute key already exists, the group attribute will be updated; if the group attribute key does not exist, the group attribute will be created.\n","example":"attribute1"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Value"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Group attribute value. This parameter is required when Action is 0; it is not required when Action is 1.\n","example":"value1"}}></SchemaItem><li className={"closing-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"closing-array-bracket"}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
